response.headline: Yama no Chaya ryokan stay in Mt. Hakone area with traditional Japanese hot spring experience
response.summary: Yama no Chaya is a traditional Japanese ryokan (inn) located in Mt. Hakone. The establishment offers an authentic experience away from city life, featuring traditional accommodations and likely hot spring facilities given the Hakone location.
